name: figma-mcp-bridge
description: Read and manipulate Figma documents in real-time through a WebSocket bridge to a Figma plugin. 82 tools for shapes, styles, components, variables, auto-layout, pages, FigJam, and more.

port.title: WebSocket Port
port.description: WebSocket port for Figma plugin connection (default: 3055, auto-increments if busy)

figma_pat.title: Figma Personal Access Token (Optional)
figma_pat.description: Required only for Comments API. Create at Figma > Settings > Security > Personal access tokens with file_comments:read and file_comments:write scopes. Leave empty if you don't need comment tools.
